price: ߖߡߊ߬ߣߊ ߡߊ߬ߛߎߘߎ߲ߧߊ ߘߐ߫ ، ߛߋ߫ ߞߍ ߞߐ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߌߣߊ߬ ߛߋ߫
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
